messages.title: Vote for Owen Thompson
messages.content: Join the SNP and help Make Scotland Stronger. Visit www.SNP.org to find out more.

messages.title: WESTMINSTER ISN'T WORKING
messages.content: Use your vote on December 12th to send a message to Boris Johnson.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: £18m in 2009 for NHS Lothian - Midlothian Community Hospital. NHS Lothian's budget in 2019-20 will be £1,441.50m, an increase of £57.2m or 4.1% compared to 2018-19. Under the SNP, the overall workforce of NHS Scotland is up 15.7%.
Since 2007, 6,561 new homes have been built in Midlothian under the SNP. This includes 1,107 council homes and 349 housing association homes.
Since its introduction in 2011, 85.2% of those working in Midlothian are on the Living Wage or above.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: HELPING SMALL BUSINESSES AND CREATING JOBS
keyPolicies.policyDescription: 1,366 recipients of the Small Business Bonus Scheme in the Midlothian Council area in 2017-18. Since 2008 businesses in Midlothian have received total relief of £19.6m.

£36.6m in 2011 for Lasswade High School, £15.6m in 2016 for Paradykes Primary School, £7.2m in 2016 for Roslin Primary School, £35.9m for Newbattle High School. And now £20m for a replacement for Beeslack High School.
£353m in 2013 for Borders Railway, Sheriffhall flyover plan to ease congestion.
In the Lothians and Scottish Borders Division of Police Scotland there are 3322 police officers, an increase of 31 since December 2018. Recorded crime has reduced by over 20% since 2006.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Scotland can choose a fairer and better path. It's time to stop Boris.

issues.brexitEurope: Westminster is broken. It has been a shambles of indecision and incompetence for years. Now we have a General Election less than two weeks before Christmas. They have no thought for ordinary people. Have you had enough yet?

personalStories.story: Owen Thompson discusses the problems facing pensioners.

examples: Westminster is broken. It has been a shambles of indecision and incompetence for years.
Use your vote on December 12th to send a message to Boris Johnson.

The Tories have already devastated Scotland's pensioners and the pension age is rising to 68. This adds to the injustice dealt to 1950's born women, who without warning saw their pensions delayed for years, and were left with little time to plan.
Owen Thompson discusses the problems facing pensioners.
Midlothian Community Hospital.
